transcript:
sitting almost asleep in a low chair, with his podgy old hands resting symmetri- cally on its arms. At the sound of Weyrother's voice, he opened his one eye with an effort. 
"Yes, yes, if you please 1 It is already late," said he, and nodding his head he let it droop and again closed his eye. 
If at first the members of the council thought that Kutiizov was pretending to sleep, the sounds his nose emitted during the reading that followed proved that the commander in chief at that moment was a
